/ * TITLES * / Messenger Messages Notifications Message notifications Friendship Requests Settings Online Away Busy Appear Offline Profile Picture Status User Name Ex: Gerson Invitations Profile Personal message Contact message 00:00 Hello, I\'m new to messenger! Your Name Wink No network My Location Contact email: Friend request Unknow Artist Unknow Title Undo friendship 0 Divider Bar E-mail email@email.com Select a Wink
/* ACTIONS */ Sign in to Messenger Sign in Sign out Cancel OK Sim Não Send Play wink Accept Decline Reply Send a message … Type here … Change profile photo Enter your Name: Add your message: Check again Send invitation Send location
/ * RESULTS OF SHARES / STATES * / %s (%d messages) Request for attention just sended you a nudge! You have just sent a nudge to %s! just sent you a location! just sent you a wink! You just sent a wink to wants to be your friend in Messenger! has just signed in … pending invitation No pending invitations pending invitations User added to your contact list! Invitation removed from list
/ * WARNINGS * / Do you really want to send this wink? To use Messenger, you must be connected to the internet! Server unavailable Are you sure you want to remove this contact from your friends list?\n(Conversations will not be deleted) The messenger server is unavailable or inaccessible, try again later! No contacts available To use Messenger add new contacts by clicking the [ \u22EE ] button in the upper right corner of the screen! No read and write permission on the store can not define a profile photo! Complete the action using: Failed to sign in with Google account The contact you are trying to add does not use messenger! There are no pending friendship invitations! Google services are currently unavailable, please try again later! Google Play Services is not installed or requires an update! You do not have any pending friendships yet! You can not add yourself! The contact is already on your list! The email you just entered is not valid!
/ * DESCRIPTIONS * / Show notifications for new friend requests Talk about what\'s happening! Change user name Change your personal message Change username Select a wink below and send to the contact
/ * STATUS ARRAY * /
Online
Away
Busy
Appear Offline
Music Show what I\'m listening to By activating this function the music you are listening to will be shared in your personal message (Not all players are compatible)
Conversation sounds Play sounds for incoming and outgoing messages Notifications Message notifications Invitation notifications New Message notifications New invitation notifications Notification sound Status notifications Online users notification Displays notifications in the chat window whenever a contact changes their status to \"Available\" Silent Vibration Contact profile Settings
